homePage.title: Welcome to Sanny Builder Library.
homePage.description: Sanny Builder Library is an attempt to build a complete and consistent class system and commands documentation spanning GTA 3D series games. Heavily based on original naming conventions.
homePage.extensions: Includes extensions (plugins) for CLEO Library and CLEO Redux for all supported games and platforms.
homePage.explore: Explore early preview documentation for GTA III, Vice City, and San Andreas.
homePage.thanksTo: Huge thanks to all researchers and contributors to the GTA modding documentation available on the following websites

commandList.emptyResult: No commands found matching the given criteria
commandList.errorLoading: Error loading data from GitHub. Check your network configuration.

shared.shareLink: Copy permanent link to this page

commandOverview.withExtension: This command is available with the {{ extension }} extension.
commandOverview.customPlatform: This command is available only on the {{ platform }} platform.
commandOverview.customPlatforms: This command is available only on the {{ platform1 }} and {{ platform2 }} platforms.
commandOverview.customVersions: This command is available only on the versions {{ versions }}.
commandOverview.customVersion: This command is available only on the version {{ version }}.

classOverview.title: Class Overview
classOverview.onlyWithExtension: only available with {{ extension }} extension

commandGames.changed: Supported in {{ game }} but has different number of parameters

generateJson.title: Download Custom JSON
generateJson.selectExtensions: Choose which extensions to include in the generated file

attributes.is_condition: This command can be used in conditional statements
attributes.is_constructor: This command creates a new in-game entity
attributes.is_destructor: This command deletes the in-game entity
attributes.is_keyword: This command is used as a single keyword followed by arguments
attributes.is_unsupported: This command is unsupported in the given game and its usage is forbidden
attributes.is_overload: This command has multiple variations for different types of arguments
attributes.is_segment: This command is used to separate segments in SCM header
attributes.is_static: This command operates on a static property or in-game entity that can not be constructed dynamically
attributes.is_positional: This command's offset in the script is used as the created entity's id

command.noConstructorWithoutOutputParams: is_constructor can't be used in a command without an output param
command.noGetterWithoutResult: Command which name starts with GET_ must have at least an output param or have 'is_condition' attribute
command.noSelfInStaticMethod: A static method can't have a parameter called 'self'
command.missingSelfParamInMethod: A class method must have the parameter called 'self' or the attribute 'is_static'
command.trailingPeriodInDescription: Command description can not end with the period
command.no3rdPersonVerb: Command description must start with a third person verb (ending -s/es)
command.outOfRangeOpcode: Opcode is out of range. Use a value between 0000 and 7FFF
command.invalidOpcode: Opcode is invalid. Use four hexadecimal digits 0 through F
command.invalidClassName: Class name should start with a letter or _ and contain only letters, digits and _
command.invalidMethodName: Method name should start with a letter or _ and contain only letters, digits and _
command.invalidConditionalOperator: Comparison operators must be used along with the 'is_condition' attribute
command.invalidArgumentWithOperator: The operator requires the first output or input parameter to be a variable
command.invalidSelfType: The 'self' parameter must be of the same type as the class
command.invalidOutputSource: The output parameter must have a source 'var_any', 'var_global' or 'var_local'

enum.emptyEnum: Enum must contain at least one field
enum.nameConflict: The enum name is already in use, use another one
enum.invalidEnumName: Enum name should start with a letter or _ and contain only letters, digits and _
enum.invalidEnumFieldName: Enum field name should start with a letter or _ and contain only letters, digits and _
